name: yumy.io
description:
- Touch the screen anywhere and drag with your finger.
- Collect buildings, props and roads into the hole.
- Eat everything in city.
- Be the biggest hole.

4 City Map

5 Gameplay Mod:
1- io ( play a game against 8 player in only 2 minutes )
2- Deathmatch ( the game ends when you die )
3- Ego ( eat everything on map in only 2 minutes )
4- Team ( select color )
5- Survival ( unlimited time )
